TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag and System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Defines an interface that enables the extension of specific behaviors of an HTML control designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.

## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
